justification: Offer ignores Team B’s conservative, floor-seeking mindset and urgent need for immediate, stable production. Ben Jackson is a high-variance deep threat and Jordan Walker is doubtful; neither fits B’s preference for safe weekly floors. B also trusts consensus and likely views Josh Flores (Tier 2 RB, friendly playoffs) as too valuable to move. Claim that A won’t hurt starters is dubious since Ben Jackson is likely A’s WR1. Rationale is terse and one-sided.
